name: gridy
description: TypeScript grid library for server and browser
author: Jan Forst <ensonador@gmail.com>

scripts.build: del-cli dist && tsc -d --declarationDir dist/types -p tsconfig.json --outDir dist/es6 && rollup dist/es6/index.js --o dist/gridy.js --f umd --name Gridy && rollup dist/es6/Diagram.js --o dist/diagram.js --f umd --name Diagram
scripts.doc: del-cli doc && typedoc --hideGenerator --mode file --out doc src/ --name Gridy --readme assets/doc.template.md
